testcase.name: Verify Password Minimum length validation message
testcase.system-out: Given I am on FaceBook Login or SignUp Page.................................passed When I click create new account.............................................passed And I fill firstname "TestFn"...............................................passed And I fill lastName "TestLn"................................................passed And I fill mobileNumberOrEmailId "1234567890"...............................passed And I fill password "1234" with less than 6 characters......................passed And I select date of birth "1990"...........................................passed And I select gender "Male"..................................................passed When I clicked on signup....................................................passed Then validation message "An error occurred. Please try again." should be displayed stating Your password must be at least 6 characters long.passed
